subject: Attn:
body:
Attn:
This is to inform you that i am in charge of the entire payment and I came across your file which was marked X and your released disk painted RED, I took time to study it and found out that you have paid VIRTUALLY all fees and but the fund was not released to you.
The most annoying thing is that they won't tell you the truth that on no account will they ever release the fund to you,instead they allow you spend money unnecessarily,I do not intend to work here all the days of my life, I can release this fund to you if you can comply with me.
I needed to do this because you need to know the status of your Funds and cause for the delay,
The only thing needed to release this fund is The Original Copy of your signed FUND RELEASE CLASSIFIED DOCUMENT which will be tendered to the paying officer to transfer your fund amount into your bank account.
Once the needed certificate is signed and obtained funds will immediately reflect in your bank within 10 Minutes,the certificate is all that is needed to complete this transaction.
Reconfirm your information below
Full name
Address
International passport
Your WHATSAPP Phone Number
is needed for further communication.
And contact us on this Email ( 
janeg5738@gmail.com
 )
Finally, we are expecting to hear from you today unfailingly to enable
us serve you better
Thank you very much for your anticipated co-operation and understanding.
Best Regards

subject: Re:   Attn:
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's really interesting to hear about the process involved in releasing funds. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these procedures, so it's quite enlightening.

Could you please explain a bit more about this FUND RELEASE CLASSIFIED DOCUMENT? What exactly is it and why is it so important for the fund release?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the fund was painted RED"? Is that some sort of financial terminology?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but as I mentioned earlier, I'm not very well-versed in these matters. Your patience and assistance are greatly appreciated.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Estelle

subject: Re: Attn:
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details? I'm all ears and ready to understand better. 

Just a quick note, I'd prefer not to share any personal information at this stage. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Estelle
